TopicTitle: Road To The Stars Chapter 1: Age Of Rocketry

Articles.Content:
The Western Kerbal Space Program has begun with the launch of the Kerbese-made Hammer 1!

https://imgur.com/a/xENmaF4

It reached a maximum altitude of about 30km. Using this knowledge, the Kerbese made their next and so far final contribution to the space program in the form of the Hammer 2, a two-stage solid fuel rocket!

https://imgur.com/a/gAIchnp

Unfortunately, it lost control and didn't go very far. But at least we landed it!

Next up was the Kerbicans' contribution, in the form of the liquid-fueled Reliant 1!

https://imgur.com/a/wBNynS6

In the next post (on this same thread) I will cover the Kerbicans' two staged SPACESHIP, Reliant 2, and the Kermans' contribution, the K2 Rocket!

Edited May 3, 2018 by ThatKSPGuy
Very nice @ThatKSPGuy!

NOTE: I did this next part on my REAL PC, instead of the previous ones, which were on my laptop. Sorry.

Reliant 2, a Kerbican two-staged, liquid fueled rocket, became the first Kerbal-made object in space!

https://imgur.com/a/a7QEg6B

Next, the final rocket of the Western Kerbal Space program (at least for now) will be launched by the Kermans, in the form of the K-2 Rocket!

https://imgur.com/a/3ithO6p

After this, the Kerbicans were chosen to lead the space program due to vote by the UK (United Kerbin), and they were getting ready to send KERBALS into space. But a new power was rising in the east...

That's the end of this post, I hope you enjoyed and I'll see you next time!

-ThatKSPGuy

Edited May 5, 2018 by ThatKSPGuy
Nice! I'm excited to see more!
